trans-unit.source: An activity that supports compensation of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade que oferece suporte à compensação de suas atividades filho.

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity allows a developer to specify a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> activity that defines a long-running task that performs their core business logic.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity permite que um desenvolvedor especificar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>atividade que define uma tarefa demorada que executa sua principal lógica de negócios.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also allows the developer to optionally specify a compensation and confirmation activity to schedule appropriate business logic in the event of errors or successful completion of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ele também permite que o desenvolvedor especifique, opcionalmente, uma atividade de compensação e a confirmação para agendar a lógica de negócios adequada no caso de erros ou a conclusão bem-sucedida de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: Compensation and confirmation of a CompensableActivity is invoked by using the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> returned by the CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Compensação e a confirmação de uma CompensableActivity é chamado usando o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>retornado pela CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is an opaque, typed object returned as the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A> argument after successful completion of a CompensableActivity activity’s <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>um objeto opaco, tipado é retornado como o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A>argumento após a conclusão bem-sucedida de uma atividade de CompensableActivity <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A></xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activities to explicitly invoke confirmation and compensation of a CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>é usado pelo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>atividades para invocar explicitamente a confirmação e compensação de uma CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity can be composed in a nested hierarchical fashion in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity pode ser composto de uma maneira hierárquica aninhada no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Compensation Programming Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Modelo de programação de compensação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade que é agendado quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> executa.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é gerada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que é agendado quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> executa.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade agendada quando a atividade é cancelada.

trans-unit.source: CancellationHandler can be used to specify custom cancelation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: CancellationHandler pode ser usado para especificar a lógica de cancelamento personalizada para o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>de <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é gerada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: A atividade agendada quando a atividade é cancelada.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade agendada quando compensação é executada no <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.
